roleset.name: mobilization of the lower end of the esophagus and plication of the fundus of the stomach up around it
roleset.note: FUNDOPLICATION-N NOTES: Comparison to verb-mobilize.01. (from fundoplication.01-n)

example.name: fundoplicate-v
example.text: [The other child]-1, noted above, had had an impaction, suspected mild stricture, and was fundoplicated *-1 with resolution of symptoms.

example.name: fundoplication-n
example.text: We identified all Veterans Affairs (VA) patients with GERD who-1 *-1 had fundoplication between 1986 and 1990
